item.description: https://www.jianshu.com/p/a84cd44bac67 进行质控 nohup fastqc -t 4 ./*.gz -o ./fastqc_results > ./fastqc.log 2>&1 & 去除低质量的部分 nohup trim_galore –illumina -o clean raw/fastq/.gz & nohup trim_galore -q 25 –phred33 –fastqc –length 36 –stringency 3 -o clean raw/fastq/.gz & 平台：–nextera 序列比对 index=/home/duansq/reference/index/hisat/mm10 ls ./*.gz |
